channel.title: Help me with this idea i have
channel.description:
*1.* Ok, so i have this idea, to make a mod only area on my server, the only trouble is where it is located, there is a gate, and i wanted to know if there was a way that i could put something infront of the gate (ex: stool/table/statue), or even just make it so that the gates won't open, if somebody could tell me on this thread how to do so it would be appreciated...(there is a tele for mods only to the area)
*2.* I need to know how to change the lvl of an npc, and its hp lvl. My idea is having a kbd around the lvl of 1800, with like 900 health, something that would be challenging. I have the kbd place, and the tele done, and i am currnetly working on a decently themed area with scared civilians and food shops...
If you answer those i would appreciate it alot!!!

item.title: Help me with this idea i have
item.dc:creator: @HockeyMaster195 HockeyMaster195
item.description:
@HockeyMaster195 wrote:

OR you could just make it completely unknown and make the command to tele there mod only?

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with this idea i have

item.title: Help me with this idea i have
item.dc:creator: @pur3_d3ath pur3 d3ath
item.description:
@pur3_d3ath wrote:

i already tried to do that to the lvl and hp it didnt wrk…

EDIT it does work, thanks, how can i make it so it shows its real cmb lvl?

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with this idea i have

item.title: Help me with this idea i have
item.dc:creator: @bob306 bob306
item.description:
@bob306 wrote:

ok well the health and lvl thing is an easy thing 2 do what u do is u open up your npc.cfg file and u look for hte monsters name that u want and next to it will b 2 lots of numbers the 1st 1 is its lvl and the second one is its hp. as for the mod only area what i think u should do is add a command/check or something into client.java that makes it so that only mods can open that gate or it just teles them over it and leaves it closed

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with this idea i have
